texts.name: Amesh
texts.biography: Amesh is the only human known to have gone toe to toe with a Sphinx during a riddling competition. His love for solving riddles and coming up with the new ones has gained him a notoriety and great respect among these esoteric creatures.

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Sphinxes or Sphinx Oracles by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 6 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Sphinxes
